direct-buy-modal.title: Free shipping, free 45-day returns
direct-buy-modal.description: This offer applies to orders shipped within the continental United States and Canada on all sonos.com purchases. Request a return or exchange within 45-days and a free return label will be emailed to you. Contact our expert support team to answer all of your product and order questions.

footer.email-disclaimer: Exclusive events and announcements. Not spam.
footer.email-invalid: A valid email address is required.

hero.paragraph: Celebrate 75 years of Blue Note Records with the Sonos PLAY:1 Blue Note Limited Edition.
hero.availability: Available March 5 at 1pm EST/ 10am PST</br>Exclusively on sonos.com for $250

year-seventyfive.header: Sonos and Blue Note.</br>It’s all about the music.
year-seventyfive.paragraph: Passionate about music, and pioneers in sound, we’ve come together because we believe in creating a transcendent music experience. To celebrate our shared dedication, and to commemorate 75 years of Blue Note’s authentic sound and originality, we’ve created our first ever limited edition speaker - the Sonos PLAY:1 Blue Note Limited Edition.

look-and-feel.paragraph: Blue Note is the essence of jazz expression. Its name is a derivative of the “blue notes” used in jazz and blues, intentionally flat to reveal a song’s raw emotion. The Blue Note PLAY:1 captures this emotion with a custom-painted finish that expresses the dramatic fades and swells unique in every performance.

close-up.paragraph: With two custom-designed drivers and dedicated amps, the Blue Note PLAY:1 delivers sound with such precision, you will feel the nuances that define jazz. And with such simple set-up you’ll be streaming your music in no time.

apps.paragraph: With the Blue Note PLAY:1, enjoy exclusive access to our Blue Note Artist Selects station, curated by legendary Blue Note artists and iconic producer Don Was. In addition, two other Blue Note stations streaming everything from the 101s to the deeper cuts, are yours at the tap of a finger.
